items.ja: 'Another celebrity boss? No, I've earned my chance'
items.en: 'Another celebrity boss? No, I've earned my chance'
items.text_for_match: 'Another celebrity boss? No, I've earned my chance' Forest Green boss Robbie Savage insists he is no "celebrity manager" after guiding his new side to a dream start, including a spot in the FA Cup first round. items.ja: Overseas game a 'sacrifice' for 'survival' of Serie A - Como
items.en: Overseas game a 'sacrifice' for 'survival' of Serie A - Como
items.text_for_match: Overseas game a 'sacrifice' for 'survival' of Serie A - Como Italian club Como say "sacrifice is essential" to ensure the "survival" of Serie A amid the financial dominance of the Premier League as they press ahead with plans to play AC Milan in Perth, Australia. items.ja: 'He's giving us a lot of joy' - Rashford's revival at Barcelona
items.en: 'He's giving us a lot of joy' - Rashford's revival at Barcelona
items.text_for_match: 'He's giving us a lot of joy' - Rashford's revival at Barcelona Marcus Rashford came to Barcelona to revive a spluttering career, and so far he is making a good job of that task, but it remains early days in Spain for the England forward.
